website_summaries.verdict: The complete audio bundle to choose when you are satisfied with your factory stereo but need more from your speakers.
pros: Comes as a complete speaker bundle to replace both the front and rear speaker sets
Each speaker is rated for 350 watts, making them more capable of producing a higher dynamic range for better music delivery
cons: Speakers require a compatible stereo system from the factory or Pioneer

customer_reviews.title: 2 of 4 speakers are cutting out.
customer_reviews.text: These speakers seemed like a good value originally. I replaced the original cheapo speakers in my '14 F150 SuperCrew with these and I will say the sound quality went from a 5/10 to a 7/10. After 14 months (out of warranty) my drivers side front speaker was cutting in and out. But now at 19 months old, the passenger side is cutting in and out. These are not quality speakers. They have not been abused or hooked up incorrectly. Out of warranty, the company is unwilling to replace. I will now throw these away and try another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good sounding speaker for the price and great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Installed these as cabinet speakers in my RV, paired up with a new pioneer car stereo, and the sound is amazing for the price. Recommend adding a speaker box and it will give you that extra smooth and powerful bass. Customer service from this seller was great, had one of the four speakers was crackling right out of the box and they let me exchange just that one speaker, rather than pull all four speakers out and make me return the whole thing.
customer_reviews.author: constantlyonthemove

customer_reviews.title: Amazing price point
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 pairs for my 05 F150 Screw cab to replace my blown out/not working Kicker KS component speakers. I'm blown away at how well these sound. Total bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.author: Btalbert89

customer_reviews.title: Good low budget door speakers
customer_reviews.text: I installed car audio equipment professionally for a good while, dealing in Hertz Audio, Audison, Diamond Audio, Rockford Fosgate and other higher grade equipment. I was looking for a low budget door speaker setup for my f150 (yes I'm that cheap to install this vs what I could get at cost) Was kinda hoping I'd be disappointed so I'd go with better speakers. I was quite surprised with the audio quality off of Kenwood head unit power. Surprising range and clear highs. Can't wait to throw a small 4 channel at them and hear them really warm up for low budget speakers!
customer_reviews.author: Jalen

customer_reviews.title: 4 better than stock speakers for cheap
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised when I ended up with 4 speakers, I wasn't really sure how many I was getting but for the price I didn't really care. So far I just put 2 in the front door, not sure if I'm going to put the other 2 in the back or just keep them as spares. They don't get very loud and the bass gets distorted pretty easily but I just have a factory head unit so these speakers probably aren't living up to their potential. They are definitely a step up from stock though
customer_reviews.author: Kurosh Makki

customer_reviews.title: Awesome speakers
customer_reviews.text: I used these to replace the speakers on a 2000 Ford Expedition. Once you get the door panel off they bolt right up to the existing speaker mounts, just ramp in the attached speaker leads. They're a huge improvement on the original speakers, which were only 25W units (and that's the premium sound system, pretty weak Ford).
customer_reviews.author: David Buzzard Photography

customer_reviews.title: 2001 F150 super crew great sound
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and very affordable. Direct fit for old 2001 factory speakers and made my truck sound great with the addition of a little 10" sub amp from rockville. Easy install if you have the ability to pull groceries out of your fridge and make a sandwich and get the groceries back in the fridge with a half way decent success rate you should be fine. Add part Metra 72-5600 plug adapters for 2001 F150 super crew no cutting no mess.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Blew first day i had em and wasn't on full blast.
customer_reviews.text: I gave them a 2 because they didn't all blow only one did. Bought a head unit that was far less amp/watts than the speakers could handle just to make sure they didn't blow. Just wanted some good quality sound, better than my 97 rangers stock speakers. Never turned it full blast and one blew a few days into having them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 2006 Ford Explorer XLT speaker upgrade
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought an apple CarPlay by pioneer for my 2006 Ford Explorer XLT and to go along with it, I searched some pioneer speakers. I found these and decided to try them out. What an improvement compared to the stock speakers in my truck. I’m super glad I purchased these. They have the right amount of bass I had in mind and great crisp sound. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Y.

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: i've been using pioneer for more than 3 decades. the reviews that say dont buy these are correct. i put 4 in my 2003 crown vic. maybe more treble but less bass than factory stock. buy some thing else.
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Major improvement!
customer_reviews.text: Well I was surprised when I swapped out the OEM speakers with these. The differences can be heard clearly. The highs are very crisp and the mids to lows are clear as well. Don't expect pounding bass from them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Working well for me
customer_reviews.text: Good sound. Good pick and solid bass . Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Manges

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great at moderate volumes.
customer_reviews.text: These speakers are so much clearer than my old factory speakers. However I noticed that when I turned the volume WAY up, the bass started to get distorted, but I was literally blasting my music at top level, so I think this might be a normal phenomenon.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb Chiu

customer_reviews.title: Gray product for the money
customer_reviews.text: Put these in my 2005 f150. Went straight from stock to these. I installed them on my stock radio that came with the truck. Sound quality is great and actually has a pretty good thump for the bass. Night and day difference than the distorted stock speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: ... in my 2010 f-150 and quality of sound is awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: These speakers fit perfectly in my 2010 f-150 and quality of sound is awesome!!!
customer_reviews.author: Reyrivera76

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement
customer_reviews.text: Good speakers deff better than some stock speakers but not as much bass as I was hoping for, some distortion at high volume
customer_reviews.author: Nathan McCrackin

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product might have to buy more for my other car just to replace
customer_reviews.author: Steven W

customer_reviews.title: Pioneer speakers
customer_reviews.text: To upgrade all four speakers in my 2000 ford explorer and they have a considerably better sound quality than what was in my car. It does not matter to me whether or not these speakers are of "high-end", superior quality, name brand, etc, etc, etc, as long as I'M satisfied with the sound quality of these speakers produce, I am perfectly fine and very happy I bought these speakers!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lani

customer_reviews.title: Get em
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install in my 2012 fx2. Get the adaptors when you buy these speakers. They sound great with kust the factory system. I plan on getting an amp soon but even without the amp they are great
customer_reviews.author: noah vickers

customer_reviews.title: Good highs, Horrible lows!
customer_reviews.text: Installed 4 of these in a 2008 Ford Escape. The high range was better than stock but the bass left a lot to be desired. Easily distorted sound on minimum bass setting on the STOCK radio. I dont recommend these speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Ensminger

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Just do yourself a favor and buy these. The mids and highs are outstanding, I have it hooked up to an amplifier, and you cant turn it up the entire way because it's too loud. Never loses distortion even as I turn it up ad loud as it goes. These speakers deserve 6 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Mick

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Sound great with my pioneer 2400 head unit and powered subs.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Got these for $17 a set of 4 someone made a typo and I jumped on the deal! The sound great even if I were to pay full price I would definitely recommend these
customer_reviews.author: Timmy

customer_reviews.title: I demoed a similar 3-way speaker set at Best Buy but found this 4-way speaker set for even ...
customer_reviews.text: These speakers were everything I planned on having and more! I demoed a similar 3-way speaker set at Best Buy but found this 4-way speaker set for even cheaper on amazon. It was a simple setup, I just had to hard-wire the speakers and I was golden. These speakers are a wonderful upgrade from the base speakers
customer_reviews.author: Mikel D.

customer_reviews.title: Price an brand quality
customer_reviews.text: Great deal for the product and price and awesome how they thru in headphones that closed me on the sell
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Mota

customer_reviews.title: Get them while they last.
customer_reviews.text: I was lucky to get these Pioneer speakers for my 1999 Ford Ranger now that the product is discontinued. Installed all four speakers and sounds great! Hard to find that size and be four way speakers
customer_reviews.author: rey

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and replacement for blown factory speakers.
customer_reviews.text: Installed these in my sons F-150. They sound great! They were put in to replace the factory speakers that were blown out. They were not installed to be part of a huge aftermarket system, just as a replacement. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Good quality nice fit
customer_reviews.text: Typically good quality from Pioneer Installed easily 2001 ford ranger super cab.
customer_reviews.author: LarCon

customer_reviews.title: Clean clear sound
customer_reviews.text: Installed four in 06 f250 with Rockford prime 400. Also 2 10" pioneer thin mount with Rockford prime 1200. System rocks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sounds good, easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: What can say..Pioneer has never disappointed me. Put these in my 97 Ranger. Sounds awesome, especially at high volume. Free headphones were "ok"...hey, they were free. Not bad for the price. Happy camper!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great value!! Vast improvement over factory and even over the last set of Pioneers that these replaced.
customer_reviews.author: John E.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect OEM replacement
customer_reviews.text: I replaced all my door speakers in my Ford Explorer with these speakers and you are able to hear every note playing through them. I swear It sounds like you're sitting in the studio in SUV, even with the volume turned close to the max !!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They sound great!
customer_reviews.text: I love the way they sound. I installed them in my 1998 F-150.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for money
customer_reviews.text: Sounded great. Magnet might not fit so good as it is larger than stock.
customer_reviews.author: Josh G.

customer_reviews.title: Keep the headphones in warehouse
customer_reviews.text: Speakers were great. Sound good and bolt up perfect. Free headphones are a joke. Improper plug for any phone or iPod on market today. Basically trying to clean out their junk on you. Burn barrel quality
customer_reviews.author: Jeff slade

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Lasted about 3 months and then one of the speakers started cutting in and out. Finally it started rattling like it blew.
customer_reviews.author: zack

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: The speakers were a drop in fit for my 2001 F250 and were a upgrade from stock. Sound great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice sounding, much better than my stock ones
customer_reviews.text: The quality in my Ford pickup sound became much better, perfect replacement
customer_reviews.author: Philbert

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker for the money
customer_reviews.text: Speakers perform well. Powered with Kicker 400W amp and Kenwood receiver they are solid and responsive. Great buy for the money. Installed in Ford extended cab pickup truck
customer_reviews.author: Mike Oxlong

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sound at good price. Sounds as good as higher end expensive speakers
customer_reviews.author: Jaime S.

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh they’re okay...
customer_reviews.text: Eh... they sound a tad better than stock. All and all just eh it’s a good speaker for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Justin DeFillippo

customer_reviews.title: Did not recieve headphones with order and speakers don't sound as good as ford stock speakers
customer_reviews.text: I was shocked to find that these pioneer speakers didn't sound near as good as the stock Ford brand speakers they replaced. I'm genuinely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Our boys loved the for their trucks
customer_reviews.text: bought 2 of these for our 2 teenage boys and they loved them! easy enough to install. would recommend, price was pretty decent.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Myers

customer_reviews.title: 2010 F 150
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and very affordable. Huge upgrade from the factory speakers in my
customer_reviews.author: Mar ilyn rico

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My husband installed them and he said they sound amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are excellent speakers! It was an easy swap for the ...
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent speakers! It was an easy swap for the factory speakers as they fit into the same mounting location as the originals.
customer_reviews.author: Roy Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good value for upgrade speakers
customer_reviews.text: Good value for upgrade speakers. Nice clear midrange and highs, Bass is good for the size. Very easy install in 2014 Mustang doors. Put the other pair in the front doors of my 2004 Expedition. super easy install here too.
customer_reviews.author: Craig M. Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Direct install in F150
customer_reviews.text: Easy install in 2008 F150 with correct harness. Sound is loud and clear. Solid improvement over factory. I paired them with a pioneer avh-nex1300 head unit, and I am happy with it. Adding 1 10" sub to round out the system.
customer_reviews.author: Michael H.

customer_reviews.title: ... at first I thought these were a piece of crap, but after finding out that I had some ...
customer_reviews.text: I have to say at first I thought these were a piece of crap, but after finding out that I had some negative and positive wire wired wrong, boy do they have a nice deep bass and crystal clear highs. if you are looking for quality then you would definitely find it in these speaker especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: not loud as expected and muffled a bit pro install
customer_reviews.author: Paul Azevedo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Way better than the factory Ford Edge speakers! Wet happy!
customer_reviews.author: Corey Alford

customer_reviews.title: Worthy
customer_reviews.text: No problems with the set sounds great and for a reasonable price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great upgrade for stock speakers
customer_reviews.text: I installed these in my 2002 ford ranger and am very happy with the sound. I did have a problem with something overheating after a while when running four speakers but worked fine with 2. I thought this may have been a problem with the OEM amp so I converted to a four channel amp and reran the speaker wire and haven't had a problem since. These speakers are a huge improvement over the stock speakers and sound good. If I needed this size speaker again I wouldn't hesitate to use these.
customer_reviews.author: jimii

customer_reviews.title: I like them they are clear and sound good
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my crown Victoria. I like them they are clear and sound good. Just doesn't have the best bass but that's fine. Sound great with metal and rock.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth J.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound!
customer_reviews.text: These speaker were a great upgrade. They sound great and were a great fit in my 2012 F-350. Awesome sound for a great price. Easy install
customer_reviews.author: cortron

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought them to replace the factory speakers in an Ford explorer.Work great, sound amazing!!! Worth every penny. Install was easy.
customer_reviews.author: Teddy

customer_reviews.title: they work great after a few hours burn in
customer_reviews.text: used these in a '98 Mark VIII to replace eight speakers in the factory system. they work great after a few hours burn in.
customer_reviews.author: THARCONIAN

customer_reviews.title: 2003 Expedition
customer_reviews.text: Install was pretty easy except the back doors.. Sounds great off the radio alone (50x4)
customer_reviews.author: Todd Hardwick

customer_reviews.title: Pioneer 6x8 speakers
customer_reviews.text: At about volume 20 with bass heavy songs they get distorted sometimes maybe 35% of the time
customer_reviews.author: Hunter Grimes

customer_reviews.title: Dependable Pioneer!
customer_reviews.text: I have always gone with pioneer when it comes to replacing factory radios and speakers since I was a teenager. As always no disappointment here. Pioneer is a great product for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome set of speakers for the cost
customer_reviews.text: Awesome set of speakers for the cost, they handle well with my Boss double din navi head unit. Bump pretty good for what they are.
customer_reviews.author: Leah rash

customer_reviews.title: Did have to bypass factory jacks
customer_reviews.text: I may need graphic eq but needs more bass! Ford Chateau
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Should give choice for zero stars!!!
customer_reviews.text: Supposed to receive 2 pairs only received 1 Really screwed up my install date Now i have to waste gas to return product. I’m going to shop elsewhere
customer_reviews.author: Honest Abe

customer_reviews.title: Really nice sound. I'm no audiophile
customer_reviews.text: Really nice sound. I'm no audiophile, but to me these sound really good. Nice bass, good highs and midrange. Good option for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound and as usual great service from Amazon and seller
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely a great set of speakers for the price. Would definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Cant bealive the quality
customer_reviews.text: Great deal for these speakers was really impressed I had it paired up with a pioneer head unit also
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Christman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worth the money. Speackers you can actually hear. Big improvement over your stock speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Hess

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sound great. Not much bass at all but awesome sound.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy A.

customer_reviews.title: EXTREMELY GOOD
customer_reviews.text: Smooth sound got me a little mad they dont got a bluetooth speaker for personal use but these are good speakers for the price
customer_reviews.author: Anthony holston

customer_reviews.title: Replaced my sons factory speakers in his 2009 Mazda 3 ...
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my sons factory speakers in his 2009 Mazda 3 Hatchback with these and added a 1600 watt amp and with a sub. Wow!
customer_reviews.author: U12BME

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They sound great and installed easily in my 04 F150
customer_reviews.author: M. Blackmon

customer_reviews.title: Sound great but mid bass is almost absent Ma b i ...
customer_reviews.text: Sound great but mid bass is almost absent Ma b i need a new stereo or something. Over all great for the price
customer_reviews.author: Gerardo

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great!
customer_reviews.text: I like them a lot in my F150 I got all pioneer now and it sound great from my mixtrack radio to my 10 in the back
customer_reviews.author: Blake Askew

customer_reviews.title: Loud
customer_reviews.text: Crisp, clean sound and very loud. Fit perfect in my 2003 explorer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They're great to have if you're looking for good all around sound.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly on my Ford ranger, and sounds great. There is a great difference between the stock speakers to these ones, which is a really big improvement. I've had them now for a few months and I have not found anything negative to say about this product. I would definitely buy these again no doubt. Also if your looking for a all round speakers there will work great, love to bass they offer plus all the other tones they offer.
customer_reviews.author: Sami

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Everything worked out and was what I expected. Thank you for a job well done
customer_reviews.author: Joe Iosia

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for the $$
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly in my 2013 Mazda 6. Sound is much better than the original speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Chike

customer_reviews.title: Boom shacka-lacka!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely bang for the buck. Now I wanna get a deck that can do em proper justice!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker for the money
customer_reviews.text: Excellent replacement for old, busted speakers in our 2008 Ford Explorer. Very easy installation and amazingly clear sound. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Badcat

customer_reviews.title: Clean and crisp highs are heard with these Pioneer speakers.
customer_reviews.text: The speaker are alot better than the previous factory speakers. Ended up replacing one of the speakers in one of the doors. The clarity on the highs are alot cleaner especially the drum cymbals. The lows are harder to tell with shaker 500 system. I believe that the lower bass is driven to the 8 in woofers in front. Will be replacing them out with separate amps.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers for the price! Loud and crisp highs, without sacrificing the bass.
customer_reviews.text: Decent bass and crisp highs, much better than the worn out paper cones my Ford came with. They easily handle max volume on my aftermarket 50 watts per channel head unit, and are loud enough to listen to with the windows down at highway speed. They fit my '05 Escape perfectly, with no drilling. Well packaged in retail boxes. I would definitely buy these speakers again, or recommend them to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: DF2000

customer_reviews.title: They sound great. For the money
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 of these speakers paired with a Kenwood eXecelon head unit, Kenwood 10" subwoofer and JL Audio 5 channel amp in my F350 SD. They sound great. For the money, you can't beat them.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Nice Sound for a low price.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install. Be sure to buy the adaptors to hook up to wires. Nice crisp sound compared to stock. Never understood when you buy a 50k truck they put cheap speakers in them unless you choose to add an upgrade to your purchase. Can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mark W. Gentry

customer_reviews.title: Quality sound but...
customer_reviews.text: Good sound quality, but after a month a tweeter blew out, the seller offered to replace it, but it wasn't worth not having a speaker in my car for an extended period of time.
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Theses speakers are amazing, didn't have a single problem
customer_reviews.text: Theses speakers are amazing, didn't have a single problem. Sounds amazing in my car. I can't Complian what so ever. Perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THE SOUND I GOT OUT OF THEM .THE PRICE IS GREAT. THEY ALSO FIT GREAT.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Junk. One speaker blown from the factory. Sending back for a refund. Bought the kickers after and they are awesome. 2002 F250.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I rated low because I haven't had the chance to ...
customer_reviews.text: I rated low because I haven't had the chance to hear them. Turns out my radio is shot and not the speakers. Will rate later.
customer_reviews.author: James Rutkowski

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfect in a 2009 Town Car.
customer_reviews.text: They fit perfect in my 2009 Town Car. I'm running these off of a 1200 watt 4-way Pioneer amp. As per usual with all speakers, I don't really think they can handle 350 watts each. But with the low-pass filter set at 400 Hertz, the 300 watts I'm pushing through them is almost completely Distortion free and extremely loud. Like permanent hearing damage loud. To get any more extreme volume than that you're going to have to modify the car to fit a more common size of aftermarket speaker. These are specifically designed to replace Factory speakers in Ford vehicles. And they do a great job. I've got no complaints especially considering the price.
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Warmth and chime... great value
customer_reviews.text: Just installed these on a stock 2014 mustang... what a great improvement for the price. Every aspect sounds better... lows, mids, highs all have a more dynamic and lively tone than the stock speakers which lacked dimension and sounded flat. I'm sure there are better speakers available than these if you want to spend more money, but no complaints from me in this price point. I purposefully chose these over some of the more expensive ones due to their rated frequency response range. They have warmth to the lows and chime to the highs. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: amazonian

customer_reviews.title: 2013 Ford F-150. Great choice!
customer_reviews.text: Direct replacement for my 2013 Ford F-150 super crew. Put four in, sound is noticbly better, louder and some actual bass. Very good product! At the time I was debating between these, the Rockford Fosgate, or Kicker. I think I made the right choice!
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Used Speakers?
customer_reviews.text: ALL 4 speakers had at least 3 of the mounting screw holes cut like they were removed from something without taking them out the correct way..... sound quality is iffy. I installed them today with the quick connectors for easy install. Plug and play, if i would have known they were going to be like this i would have bought a similar speaker for a little bit more money. I thought i was gettibg a new set by going this route but they are clearly used.....WTF.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I recommend these for entry/secondary level users
customer_reviews.text: Very good sounding. I swapped out factory speakers and Kicker DS models for these. They have great bass and good all-around sound quality. I recommend taking off the plastic ring that comes on the speakers because they rattle and I will have to take all of my doors apart to take them off. The headphones are mediocre but, a nice thought.
customer_reviews.author: Cambam

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: These speakers are very well made & have a very easy install or at least for my Ford Explorer, & despite the other wrong reviews , these speakers have a heavy amount of bass & treble therefore creating high quality sound to comfort the listener, I recommend these speakers if you love great sound, the reason I’m not giving them 5 stars is just because I wish they were more watts due to how loud I like my music !
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Polasek

customer_reviews.title: Totally satisfied. I have used pioneer speakers since the 80's ...
customer_reviews.text: Totally satisfied. I have used pioneer speakers since the 80's and these are another example of a good product for a reasonable price. Nice warm sound with plenty on the top and bottom. I use them along with avh4200 head unit for "as good as I need" system. Yes you can spend more, yes you can get better, but IT'S A TRUCK. These work well.
customer_reviews.author: JAB

customer_reviews.title: Loud and clear
customer_reviews.text: Good clear sound, decent bass but overall a huge improvement over the stock speakers. These were a direct replacement front and back for my 03 f350
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Sound Really Good
customer_reviews.text: Replaced the factory speakers in my 2010 Ford Ranger. They fit perfectly. The bass quality is good (not subwoofer powerful but have a solid thump) and the mids and highs are nice and distinctive. If you want to improve your sound system, these are an inexpensive way to do that. I have an aftermarket double din stereo that power these.
customer_reviews.author: The Fixer

customer_reviews.title: Great replacements for the original Ford speakers
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to replace the original speakers in my '97 F-150. These are perfect drop-in replacements and have very good sound for the price. Sound much better than the originals, even when they were new. I recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Dan R.

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound, Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: Replaced stock Ford 4 ohm 25W speakers in my '07 Taurus with these. Paired them up with the Pumpkin single DIN Android radio. They sound awesome. Clear and crisp across the spectrum. You get to hear all the different aspects of your music due to the 4-way design. For sure worth the money and made my 1.5 hour commute much more tolerable.
customer_reviews.author: Renegade5399
